headline: Is ON Semiconductor Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether ON Semiconductor is finally trading at a bargain or just a value trap in disguise, you are not alone. This is exactly the question we are going to unpack. The stock has bounced about 2.1% over the last week and 19.3% over the past month, even though it is still down 9.8% year to date and 18.0% over the last year. That makes its recent momentum feel more like a potential inflection point than a victory lap. Recently, investors have been focused on ON...
